text: Hagi Babiloni vahe ha' vahe'mota kevetamia ahegona nehuta hankotamia erisga hiho. Babiloni vahe'mo'zama Ra Anumzamofo mono noma eri havizama hu'naza zanku huno, Ra Anumzamo'a arimpa ahenezmanteno zamazeri haviza hunaku, Midia kini vahera zamazeri otisige'za e'za Babiloni vahera hara eme huzmantegahaze.
